sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GDM package contains gdm, gdm-binary, gdmXnestchooser, gdmchooser, gdmflexiserver, gdmgreeter, gdmlogin, gdmmktemp, gdmphotosetup, gdmsetup, gdmthemetester, gdm-restart, gdm-safe-restart, gdm-stop, gdmaskpass, gdmconfig and gdmopen.

sect3.title: gdm
sect3.para: gdm is a wrapper script to execute the GDM binary, the configurable GNOME based login prompt.

sect3.title: gdmchooser
sect3.para: gdmchooser is an application for selecting XDMCP enabled hosts on the local network.

sect3.title: gdmsetup
sect3.para: gdmsetup is a graphical interface to edit the gdm.conf.

sect3.title: gdm-restart and gdm-safe-restart
sect3.para: gdm-restart sends the HUP signal and gdm-safe-restart sends the USR1 signal to the daemon so that it restarts. They are used after the config file is edited.

sect3.title: gdmconfig
sect3.para: gdmconfig is an application for managing the configuration of the entire GDM applications suite. It handles look and feel, security, XDMCP, GDMchooser and more.
